title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as (default).

NOTES:

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog.

 g. Why does the File Editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f.

Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB:
The 'Add' button adds a hidden entry.
The associated editors list shows entries that already exist in the list and can be selected.
The File Editors Preferences page grows in height when it is selected, but other pages do not behave the same way.
EB:
'Add' should not add a hidden entry.
Entries that already exist in the associated editors list should not be available for selection.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press the 'Add' button.
3. Observe the hidden entry in the associated editors list.

To reproduce issue with existing entries:
1. Open the associated editors list.
2. Select an entry that already exists in the list.
3. Observe that the entry is still available for selection.

To reproduce issue with File Editors Pref page:
1. Open the File Editors Preferences page.
2. Observe how its height changes when it is selected, unlike other pages.
